archimate:Requirement.name: SI-14(3): Non-persistence | Non-persistent Connectivity
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Establish connections to the system on demand and terminate connections after [Selection: completion of a request; a period of non-use].

properties.value: Persistent connections to systems can provide advanced adversaries with paths to move laterally through systems and potentially position themselves closer to high value assets.
